heroSubtitle: Learn from us and become a professional!
introParagraph1: At Color Me Crazy salon, we offer hairdressing education where you can learn from our experienced professionals. Whether you're just starting in the profession or want to develop your skills, you're in the right place with us.
introParagraph2: During our training courses, you can learn the latest techniques, master various cutting and coloring methods, and gain insight into the daily life of the salon.
basicTrainingDescription: Learn the basics of hairdressing, hair cutting and washing techniques, and get familiar with various tools and products.
advancedDescription: Develop your skills with modern cutting and coloring techniques, balayage, ombre, and other special procedures.
mentoringDescription: Personalized training from our experienced hairdressers, where you can focus on topics of your choice.
appointmentText: Our courses start by appointment. Contact us to find the right time for you!
smallGroupText: We work in small groups so that each participant receives maximum attention and help from the instructors.
practicalText: Mastering practice is the most important. You can practice on real models under the supervision of our instructors.
ctaText: Apply now and start your journey in the world of hairdressing!
